element.name: TMQTTPacketType
element.descr: ptCONNECT, Client request to connect to Broker ptCONNACK, Connect Acknowledgment ptPUBLISH, Publish Packet ptPUBACK, Publish Acknowledgment ptPUBREC, Publish Received (assured delivery part 1) ptPUBREL, Publish Release (assured delivery part 2) ptPUBCOMP, Publish Complete (assured delivery part 3) ptSUBSCRIBE, Client Subscribe request ptSUBACK, Subscribe Acknowledgment ptUNSUBSCRIBE, Client Unsubscribe request ptUNSUBACK, Unsubscribe Acknowledgment ptPINGREQ, PING Request ptPINGRESP, PING Response ptDISCONNECT, Client is Disconnecting
